H0.text: Inertia is a force that keeps the planets in orbit around the Sun.

H1.text: Gravity is the force that keeps the planets in orbit around the Sun.

H2.text: Magnetism is a force that keeps the planets in orbit around the Sun.

H3.text: Solar energy is a force that keeps the planets in orbit around the Sun.

A4.text: Planets orbit the Sun in an ellipse as a consequence of the law of gravity.

A5.text: Borelli developed the idea of mechanical equilibrium, a balance between inertia and gravity.
